property.name: description
property.value: An accessor for playing a sound clip from a URL or a resource on the local host. The URL or resource name can be provided as a parameter or as an input. To start playing the sound, an event must be provided to the start input. An event at the stop input, or a new event at the start input, will cause the sound to stop playing.

property.name: start (port)
property.value: A trigger input to start playback. The value is ignored and can be anything.

property.name: stop (port)
property.value: A trigger to stop playback. The value is ignored and can be anything.

property.name: clipURL (port)
property.value: The URL to retrieve the sound clip from.
